meanings.definition: A kick in football made from a stationary position on the ground.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the player took a powerful placekicks to score a goal.
meanings.sent2: The coach praised the team for their accurate placekicks during practice.
meanings.sent3: The placekicks in the match were so precise that they seemed like magic.
meanings.sent4: His placekicks were like thunder, echoing across the field.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the placekicks filled the stadium, exciting the fans.

meanings.definition: To kick a football from a stationary position on the ground.
meanings.sent1: He placekicks the ball with precision every time he takes a shot.
meanings.sent2: Players often placekicks when they need to make accurate passes.
meanings.sent3: She placekicks the ball so well, it's like she has a built-in radar.
meanings.sent4: The way he placekicks the ball is like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: Watching him placekicks is like watching an artist at work.
